# constellation

**Instance Property**

A variable that describes how a face landmarks request orders or enumerates the resulting features.

## Declaration

```swift
var constellation: VNRequestFaceLandmarksConstellation { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this variable to one of the supported constellation types detailed in [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNRequestFaceLandmarksConstellation]. The default value is [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNRequestFaceLandmarksConstellation/constellationNotDefined].

## Locating Face Landmarks

- **VNRequestFaceLandmarksConstellation**: An enumeration of face landmarks in a constellation object.
